scripts.dev: concurrently -n client,server,admin -c green,blue,magenta "pnpm run -C app/client-nx dev" "pnpm run -C app/server-ns dev" "pnpm run -C app/admin-v dev"
scripts.start:test: concurrently -n client,server,admin -c green,blue,magenta "pnpm run -C app/client-nx start:test" "pnpm run -C app/server-ns start:test" "pnpm run -C app/admin-v start:test"
